subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Colts fans, some wearing “Deflatriots” T-shirts to remind Tom Brady of last year’s scandal, hoped their team would bury the Patriots. But New England continued its mastery of Indianapolis.
snippet: Colts fans, some wearing “Deflatriots” T-shirts to remind Tom Brady of last year’s scandal, hoped their team would bury the Patriots. But New England continued its mastery of Indianapolis.
